runs.comm: very full and outside off, lures Munsey into an away-from-the-body drive. Beaten emphactically
fullish and on off, defensively pushed to mid-off
fractionally short and outside off, cut to deep third man
edged but does not carry to Shaiman at second slip. Good length and skids on outside off, Coetzer looks for a drive, gets an outer edge that dies in front of Shaiman
back of a length and outside off, punched to point
back of a length and on middle, dropped in front of point. Munsey looks for a speedy single but is sent back
back of a length and on middle, jabbed in front of mid-on for a single
back of a length and angled in on middle with a bit of extra bounce. Munsey is surprised by it as he wafts and gets socked on the glove
much fuller, blocked on the off stump
length and on middle, Munsey flits around in the crease and tries to manufacture a sweep over short fine leg. No dice, he is hit on the pads
loopy slower ball outside off, stops on Munsey, who chips it over the covers. He did not control the hit at all
back of a length and on middle, Coetzer unleashes a big swing of the bat and clubs it behind square leg off the inside half of the bat
top strike from Munsey. Short and wide outside off, he leans back and middles a cut through cover-point, skips away to the boundary
much shorter and hurries on middle, tucks up Munsey for room. Fended to the leg side
overpitched and put away. Drilled down the ground, past the non-striker for the second four of the over
good length and on middle, Munsey gets forward and pushes it in front of point
back of a length and sort of skids on off, slapped straight to the man at point

dug in short and on a leg-stump line, helped away wide of short fine leg with a pull. They hustle for two, the fielder fires a throw at the non-strikers'. The man backing up - Faizan Asif - fails to collect the ball cleanly and messes up a run-out chance
slower short ball on middle, sits up to be smacked. Coetzer makes it look worse by pummeling a pull over midwicket
and again! One-bounce four. On a length and on middle, Coetzer loads up and swipes it with plenty of muscle over midwicket
make that a hat-trick of fours. Too full and outside off, Coetzer skips away, makes room and drills a drive through the covers
length and outside off, heave and a miss
another one-bounce four. Slower ball outside off, he goes across the line and swings it over midwicket. No chance for the man in the deep
back of a length and outside off, powered away wide of midwicket, banished to the boundary. Coetzer pillages five fours of the over
full and tight line outside off, Javed claims the outside edge. But it sneaks away through vacant slip cordon
fullish and on middle, Munsey takes the aerial route and slugs it over midwicket. Munsey has coach Bradburn clapping
Scotland are dealing in boundaries. What a way to bring up the co-hosts' fifty. A shade too full on middle, he picks it up and launches it over backward square leg
he drills it through the covers. Munsey steps away outside leg, Javed does not get the yorker right and pays the penalty
attempted yorker translates into a low full toss, Munsey does not connect with the flick. Off the pad and wanders away to short fine leg. The lbw appeal amounts to nothing; snaking down leg
dot! Good length and on off, flayed to the man at the covers
shortish and tucks up the batsman for room. Dropped onto the pitch from the crease
shortish and on middle, Munsey sinks to one knee and laps it fine on the leg side. Shahzad does not have enough pace to trouble batsmen with short balls
back of a length and on middle, sits up again. Walloped over midwicket for a one-bounce four. Munsey sat back and swung his arms through it
another stray ball, down the leg side. Munsey folds low in the crease and unfurls another lap-sweep for four, runs away to the long-leg boundary
slower one outside leg, following Munsey who was looking to make room. He adjusts and pushes it down to long-on
down the track, manufactures a half-volley and slams a drive between mid-off and the bowler
superb connection.. Straight ball on middle, be brings out the reverse-sweep, hits it along the ground and sends it to third man
slid through on middle, blocked in front of midwicket. Coetzer wants a single but is sent back
pushed through, he takes it from an off-stump line and reverse-sweeps it behind square to bring up his fifty. He raises his bat and acknowledges the cheers
down the track, takes it on the full and drags it to long-on
slower through the air and outside off, Coetzer slinks down the track and swipes it forcefully to the right of short midwicket
short and outside off, Munsey takes a step forward and drags a pull to long-on
length and on middle, Coetzer, having stepped away outside leg, has ample leverage to tonk it over the covers
banged in short and cramps him up on a leg-stump line. He misses the pull and gets a single via leg-bye
back of a length and on middle, helped to short fine leg with a sweep

Naveed bags a consolatory wicket. This was darted full on middle, Coetzer steps away outside leg, but can't crash a drive through the covers. He does not connect, the middle stump gets tilted back. No fifty for Coetzer
loopy full toss on the pads, whipped away through backward square leg
MacLeod ventures down the track and shows his ace a bit too early. Javed is smart enough to shorten his length. Beaten
full and holds its line on off, MacLeod tips forward and pats it to mid-off
back of a length and on off, manipulated with the wrists behind square on the leg side
overpitched and outside off, Munsey bends his knees and unleashes a rasping drive through the covers, beats long-off to his right
Javed retorts with a yorker, jabbed onto the pitch
an appeal for lbw, nipped firmly in the bud because of an inside edge. Good length and tails in a touch, he pushes and ekes out an inside edge onto the pad
too full and straight, he misses the flick and sneaks a leg-bye
fullish and on middle, squeezed to short fine leg for one. A direct hit could have left Munsey in trouble
MacLeod makes room outside leg, Naveed follows him with a pin-point yorker. The former can't adjust and dig it out
dragged short and outside off, Coetzer muscles it over mid-on

Scotland thump UAE by nine wickets with ten overs to spare. MacLeod slinks away outside leg, Naveed serves up a full toss as he does not get hold of the yorker. Carved through backward point for the winnings runs
